snippet.title: THE CANDLE - Trailer
snippet.description:
The Candle - Rated R.
WISHLIST HERE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3439000/The_Candle/

As night falls and a storm rises over the annual county carnival, you are visited by a mysterious spirit. Tasked with laying his soul to rest, you must brave his long dilapidated manor and avoid the horrifying remnants of his estate staff.
